apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: image-demo-7229
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: image-demo-7229
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:stable
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
    securityContext:
      privileged: false

        drop:

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx7
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: bitnami/nginx:stable
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx7
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: bitnami/nginx:stable
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

metadata:

environment variable WILDCARD_ENDPOINT_CERT_SECRET must use secretKeyRef

patched_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: enmasse
    name: address-space-controller
  name: address-space-controller
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: enmasse
      name: address-space-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: enmasse
        name: address-space-controller
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - weight: 1
            preference:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: node-role.enmasse.io/operator-infra
                operator: In
                values:
                - 'true'
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: JAVA_OPTS
          value: -verbose:gc
        - name: ENABLE_EVENT_LOGGER
          value: 'true'
        - name: EXPOSE_ENDPOINTS_BY_DEFAULT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: exposeEndpointsByDefault
              name: address-space-controller-config
              optional: true
        - name: ENVIRONMENT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: environment
              name: address-space-controller-config
              optional: true
        - name: TEMPLATE_DIR
          value: /opt/templates
        - name: RESOURCES_DIR
          value: /opt
        - name: STANDARD_AUTHSERVICE_CONFIG_NAME
          value: keycloak-config
        - name: STANDARD_AUTHSERVICE_CREDENTIALS_SECRET_NAME
          value: keycloak-credentials
        - name: STANDARD_AUTHSERVICE_CERT_SECRET_NAME
          value: standard-authservice-cert
        - name: WILDCARD_ENDPOINT_CERT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: wildcardEndpointCertSecret
              name: address-space-controller-config
              optional: true
        - name: RESYNC_INTERVAL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: resyncInterval
              name: address-space-controller-config
              optional: true
        - name: RECHECK_INTERVAL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: recheckInterval
              name: address-space-controller-config
              optional: true
        - name: IMAGE_PULL_POLICY
          value: Always
        - name: ROUTER_IMAGE
          value: registry.redhat.io/amq7/amq-interconnect:1.4
        - name: STANDARD_CONTROLLER_IMAGE
          value: registry.redhat.io/amq7/amq-online-1-standard-controller:dev
        - name: AGENT_IMAGE
          value: registry.redhat.io/amq7/amq-online-1-agent:dev
        - name: BROKER_IMAGE
          value: registry.redhat.io/amq-broker-7/amq-broker-73-openshift:latest
        - name: BROKER_PLUGIN_IMAGE
          value: registry.redhat.io/amq7/amq-online-1-broker-plugin:dev
        - name: TOPIC_FORWARDER_IMAGE
          value: registry.redhat.io/amq7/amq-online-1-topic-forwarder:dev
        - name: MQTT_GATEWAY_IMAGE
          value: registry.redhat.io/amq7/amq-online-1-mqtt-gateway:dev
        - name: MQTT_LWT_IMAGE
          value: registry.redhat.io/amq7/amq-online-1-mqtt-lwt:dev
        image: registry.redhat.io/amq7/amq-online-1-address-space-controller:dev
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: http
            scheme: HTTP
        name: address-space-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: http
            scheme: HTTP
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      serviceAccountName: address-space-controller

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dc-api
  labels:
    app: dc-api
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dc-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dc-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: dc-api
        image: gcr.io/neural-pattern-278618/dc-api:stable
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: dc-api
        - secretRef:
            name: dc-api
        - secretRef:
            name: postgres
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: '0.3'
          requests:
            cpu: '0.3'
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 3
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 5
          initialDelaySeconds: 200
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: foo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: foo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: dgkanatsios/simpleapp:stable
        name: simpleapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: banias-frontend
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: banias-frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: banias-frontend
        k8s-app: banias-frontend
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: init-sysctl
        image: busybox:stable
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - 'sysctl -w net.ipv4.ip_forward=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.icmp_ignore_bogus_error_responses=1

          sysctl -w kernel.msgmnb=65536

          sysctl -w kernel.msgmax=65536

          sysctl -w kernel.shmmax=68719476736

          sysctl -w kernel.shmall=4294967296

          sysctl -w net.core.somaxconn=50000

          sysctl -w fs.file-max=100000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians=0

          sysctl -w net.core.somaxconn=50000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog=30000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_slow_start_after_idle=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_window_scaling=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_timestamp=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_sack=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control=htcp

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time=60

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_time_wait=10

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_established=300

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_generic_timeout=300

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets=2000000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout=10

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl=15

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes=5

          '
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      containers:
      - name: banias-frontend
        image: gcr.io/my-project/banias-frontend:test
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: '3'
            memory: 12G
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - name: google-cloud-key
          mountPath: /var/secrets/google
        ports:
        - name: http
          containerPort: 8081
        - name: prom-metrics
          containerPort: 8080
        env:
        - name: BANIAS_PROJECTID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PROJECTID
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_DEBUG
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_DEBUG
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_TOPIC
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_TOPIC
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PORT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_METRICSPORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_METRICSPORT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXBATCH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXBATCH
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBAGGRIGATORS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBAGGRIGATORS
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXPUBLISHDELAY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXPUBLISHDELAY
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINESAMOUNT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINESAMOUNT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINEIDLEDURATION
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINEIDLEDURATION
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS
          value: /var/secrets/google/key.json
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: google-cloud-key
        secret:
          secretName: pubsub-key
